english.segment1: Time moves. You knew it would. You'd leave them all. After their plainer thoughts. You lose some. I knew you would. You'd leave them all. After their plainer thoughts
english.segment2: Time away. I wish you'd call on me
english.segment3: Because. I knew we would. We'd leave them all. After their plainer thoughts. You lose some. I knew you would. You'd lose them all. Some how they just forgot
english.segment4: Time away. I wish you'd call on me
